00041 template <class T>
00042 class FCDLibrary : public FCDObject
00043 {
00044 protected:
00046     typedef FUObjectContainer<T> FCDEntityContainer;
00047 
00051     FCDEntityContainer entities;
00052 
00053 public:
00057     FCDLibrary(FCDocument* document);
00058 
00060     virtual ~FCDLibrary();
00061 
00064     inline T* AddEntity() { return entities.Add(GetDocument()); SetDirtyFlag(); }
00065 
00070     inline void AddEntity(T* entity) { return entities.push_back(entity); SetDirtyFlag(); }
00071 
00076     T* FindDaeId(const fm::string& daeId);
00077 
00080     inline bool IsEmpty() const { return entities.empty(); }
00081 
00086     bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* node);
00087 
00090     void WriteToXML(xmlNode* node) const;
00091 
00094     inline size_t GetEntityCount() const { return entities.size(); }
00095 
00100     inline T* GetEntity(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < GetEntityCount(), return NULL); return entities.at(index); }
00101 
00106     inline const T* GetEntity(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < GetEntityCount(), return NULL); return entities.at(index); }
